message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $20,000 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product.  While I'm willing to negotiate, that price point is a bit too low for me.  Could you do $17,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget. I can do $13,500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
